user.title: Inverter / Battery Source
user.description: Select the inverter type and the entity that reports your battery's state of charge.

data_description.inverter_type: Choose your inverter brand or select Generic if your inverter is not listed
data_description.inverter_entity: The sensor entity that provides the battery state of charge (0â€“100 %)
data_description.inverter_soc_attribute: Only required for Generic (attribute): the attribute name on the entity that contains the SOC value

forecast.title: Solar Forecast Source
forecast.description: Select the solar forecast provider and its entity.

data.forecast_today_from_state: Today Total Comes From Entity State

data_description.forecast_type: Choose your solar forecast provider or Generic for any other integration
data_description.forecast_entity: The sensor entity that provides solar production forecasts
data_description.forecast_attribute: Name of the entity attribute that holds the forecast list (e.g. forecasts)
data_description.forecast_period_start_field: Field name in each forecast item for the period start datetime (e.g. period_start)
data_description.forecast_pv_estimate_field: Field name in each forecast item for the power estimate in kW (e.g. pv_estimate)
data_description.forecast_today_from_state: When enabled, today's total kWh is read from the entity state; otherwise it is summed from the forecast list

prices.title: Electricity Price Source
prices.description: Select the electricity price provider and its entity.

data_description.prices_type: Choose your electricity price provider or Generic for any other integration
data_description.prices_entity: The sensor entity that provides current and upcoming electricity prices
data_description.prices_attribute: Name of the entity attribute that holds the price list (e.g. prices)
data_description.prices_period_start_field: Field name in each price item for the period start datetime (e.g. from)
data_description.prices_price_field: Field name in each price item for the price value (e.g. price)

battery.title: Battery Specifications
battery.description: Enter the hardware parameters for your battery system.

data_description.battery_capacity: Total usable capacity of your battery in kWh
data_description.max_charge_rate: Maximum rate at which your battery can charge in kW
data_description.max_discharge_rate: Maximum rate at which your battery can discharge in kW
